domains.use: Cross-domain ID, deprecated in Prebid 5.x. Aside: this is the only purpose Prebid obtained a GVL id for; other device storage set by publisher software maintained by prebid.js are publisher set values. Prebid is not a vendor, tracker, or processor of personal information on independent sites or apps running prebid software. There is no reason to seek consent for Prebid's vendor id unless a publisher is using long deprecated functionality.
